doc.field: Series II: New York City Views - the Bronx
Series II: New York City Views - the Bronx
New-York Historical Society collection of geographic images
New-York Historical Society collection of geographic images
includes: 1891 auction map of lots for sale in 23rd Ward, near St. Mary's Park;
"A View of Phillip's Manor and the Rocks on the Hudson," from a drawing dated 1784;
"View of Melrose and Surroundings taken from the Ursuline Convent," 1868;
Mott Haven, showing Mott Iron Works;
1896 auction map of lots for sale at Underwood Terrace, Morris Heights, 24th ward;
"Historical Morrisania (Village)," 1861. Three versions, one with color;
"Plan of E.C. Cooper's Patent Inclined Plane Salt Works," City Island, East River, circa 1835;
"Fairmount Atheneum. Lewis Terrace, West Morrisania" undated;
"Car tracks, Cars, and Wagons on Third Avenue, Morrisania...and location of posts for proposed elevated railroad," 1881.
New-York Historical Society collection of geographic images
